vote.title: An ordinance approving and authorizing (1) the issuance and sale of City of Dallas, Texas, Special Tax Revenue Obligations (Fair Park Venue Project), Series 2023 in an amount not to exceed $51,000,000; (2) a Master Indenture of Trust and a First Supplemental Indenture of Trust; (3) making findings with respect to the issuance of such obligations; and (4) providing an effective date - Financing: 2023 (Fair Park Venue Project Bonds Fund ($629,525) and Convention and Event Services Fund ($14,500)
vote.description: An ordinance approving and authorizing (1) the issuance and sale of City of Dallas, Texas, Special Tax Revenue Obligations (Fair Park Venue Project), Series 2023 in an amount not to exceed $51,000,000; (2) a Master Indenture of Trust and a First Supplemental Indenture of Trust; (3) making findings with respect to the issuance of such obligations; and (4) providing an effective date - Financing: 2023 (Fair Park Venue Project Bonds Fund ($629,525) and Convention and Event Services Fund ($14,500)
